summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding a pH buffer to stabilize levels closer to 7.2-7.4.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain below 500 ppm for optimal fish health.
Maintain water temperature between 24-28°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.006 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 331.777 / 307.8 / 342.1 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.746 / 21.31 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
